dict.acceptation: 审查（某人过去的记录、资格等）；诊疗；检查；

sent.orig: A vet at the zoo checked Mary Zwo vet said she was strong enough to travel.
sent.trans: 动物园一名兽医为玛莉苏做检查，说它的身体状况足以应付旅途不便。

sent.orig: The vet prescribed a medicine to worm my puppy.
sent.trans: 兽医开了一种药驱除我那小狗体内的寄生虫。

sent.orig: All new pets should be checked over by a vet.
sent.trans: 所有新生的宠物都应该让兽医仔细检查。

sent.orig: I want to be a vet when i grow up, I am an animal rights activist.
sent.trans: 我想成为一名兽医当我长大了，我是一个动物权利活动家。

sent.orig: Later in his life. Herriot wrote a lot about his experience as a country vet.
sent.trans: 在生活晚期，赫利奥特写了许多有关当乡村兽医时的经历。
